title: "English Article Writing (Academic Writing)"
original_prompt: "Correct the spelling and grammar errors in this sentence: 'We is friensd'."
input1: "We is not only friensd but also loyal and supportive friends."
input2: "Despite the fact that we is friensd, we often have misunderstandings."
input1_ans: "We are not only friends but also loyal and supportive."
"We are not only friends but also loyal and supportive friends."
input2_ans: "Despite the fact that we are friends, we often have misunderstandings."
"Despite the fact that we are friends, we often have misunderstandings."
